name: Lazuria Project DEMO
description:
An era of peace that once graced the pages of Lazuria's history is at an end. After a sudden rebellion sparks a flame of holy war, those who never knew the horrors of combat are now faced with a grim reality... and eerie silence from their gods.

Experience the stories of a diverse cast of characters including Sol Bluestar, a young noble thrust into the battlefield, where he must decide what kind of world he fights for, and Nikolai Chóros, a prince of an ancient lineage who must decide which is more important: his legacy or his family.

Side-note: This is my first attempt at game development, and I'd love to hear your constructive feedback and advice. Anything helps, so don't be afraid to criticize!

SCREENSHOTS:

Title Screen and Logo Battle Screen Support System, Fog of War Story Cutscene Combat Interface
